title: Vaccine passports: Covid rule change 'a blow to most vulnerable'
content:
1. Vaccine passports: Covid rule change 'a blow to most vulnerable'  BBC News
  2. UK PM Johnson to set out COVID-19 booster strategy under winter plan  Reuters UK
  3. U.K.'s Johnson to Give Green Light to Covid Booster Shot Program  Bloomberg
  4. Boris Johnson will need a wider booster jab programme and vaccine passports to avoid winter lockdowns  iNews
  5. Boris Johnson’s winter Covid plan will owe more to luck than judgement  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
